DOC.brief_summary: To investigate diagnostic value ultralow-dose computed tomography detection pulmonary nodule lung parenchym alteration ( e.g . emphysema ) compare standard-dose-CT .
DOC.brief_title: Diagnostic Value Ultralow-dose Computed Tomography Detection Pulmonary Nodules Lung Parenchym Alterations Compared Standard-dose CT
DOC.criteria: plan normal doseCT clinical indication institution obtain informed consent plan lowdoseCT clinical indication institution inform consent obtain age < 18 year pregnancy
